title: Dialogue Practice: Home Life
description: Practice a complete home & family dialogue.

steps.pinyin: A: nǐ jiā de kè tīng dà ma?
B: bú dà, dàn shì hěn míng liàng.
A: nǐ xǐ huān zài jiā zuò shén me?
steps.english_hint: What do you like to do at home?

steps.pinyin: B: wǒ xǐ huān zuò cài.
A: nǐ fáng jiān lǐ yǒu shén me jiā jù?
steps.english_hint: What furniture do you have in your room?

steps.pinyin: B: yǒu chuáng, shū zhuō hé shū jià.
steps.english_hint: A bed, a desk, and a bookshelf.

steps.pinyin: A: nǐ zuó tiān zài jiā zuò le shén me?
steps.english_hint: What did you do at home yesterday?

steps.pinyin: B: wǒ zuó tiān zhěng lǐ le fáng jiān.
A: zhōu mò nǐ xiǎng zuò shén me?
steps.english_hint: What do you want to do this weekend?

steps.pinyin: B: wǒ xiǎng xiū xí yí xià.
steps.english_hint: I want to rest a bit.

review.summary: You finished Chapter 6! Great work on home, family, hobbies, and past tense.
review.mission: Next chapter: Chapter 7 — Town, directions, transportation, and simple future tense.
